Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western and #X49 Western Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/Berwyn
ShortDescription: NB #49 Western & #X49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Foster, Lincoln, Bryn Mawr and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Berwyn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #49 Western & #X49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Foster, Lincoln, Bryn Mawr and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Berwyn.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 35th/Shields
ShortDescription: Westbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Fields, 33rd, Wallace and 35th: due to, street blockage near 35th/Shields.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Fields, 33rd, Wallace and 35th: due to, street blockage near 35th/Shields.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 35th/Shields
ShortDescription: Eastbound 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 42nd, Root, Normal, 43rd, Princeton, Root and Wentworth: due to, street blockage near 35th/Shields.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 42nd, Root, Normal, 43rd, Princeton, Root and Wentworth: due to, street blockage near 35th/Shields.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Oak Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Oak Park.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
